statements: SELECT * FROM faq_articles;
SELECT title, content FROM faq_articles WHERE category = 'General';
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM faq_articles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM faq_articles WHERE id = 2;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM faq_articles GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM faq_articles ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT title, content FROM faq_articles WHERE category = 'General'
SELECT id, category FROM faq_articles WHERE title LIKE '%help%'
SELECT * FROM faq_articles WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT id, title, category FROM faq_articles WHERE content LIKE '%SQL%'

SELECT id, question FROM FAQs ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT question, answer FROM FAQs WHERE question LIKE '%database%'

SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT f.question, t.tag_name FROM faqs f JOIN faqs_tags ft ON f.id = ft.faq_id JOIN tags t ON ft.tag_id = t.tag_id;

SELECT tag_name FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT faqs.question, faqs.answer, tags.tag_name FROM faqs LEFT JOIN faqs_tags ON faqs.id = faqs_tags.faq_id LEFT JOIN tags ON faqs_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id WHERE faqs.id = 2;
